ObjectClass.Name: ChronoShield Guardian - Achron
ObjectClass.Description: COMBAT GUARDIAN (OCTOPOD): Critical damage: Guardian shell is disabled Emergency ChronoShield safeguard activated

ObjectClass.Name: Combat Guardian - Achron
ObjectClass.Description:
COMBAT GUARDIAN (OCTOPOD): Combat enabled achronal bio-cybernetic command shell
Sacrifices movement speed for regenrating heavy armor and light weapons
Consumes 2 Power/s while active
Vulnerable to overheating

Objective.Name: Move
Objective.Details: \Move to specified location\ \Move Speed: 1, MaxInc: 30\Vision Radius: 25, Aggro Range: 23

Objective.Name: Attack
Objective.Details: Attack specified target or enemies spotted\ en route to specified location \[Weapons Avg Damage/5secs ]\VS Ground: 27, R: 22, SR: 1\VS Air: 27, R: 22, SR: 1

Objective.Name: Patrol
Objective.Details: Hold CTRL and select up to 5 points to\continuously patrol around\Target one of your own units to HOLD\current position or select a single\location to HOLD that position

Objective.Name: Change Commander
Objective.Details: \Set this unit's commander\ \Alt-Right-Click on unit to\select its current commander

Objective.Name: Remove from Hierarchy
Objective.Details: \Remove unit from hierarchy\to disconnect from commander\and all subordinates

Objective.Name: Stop
Objective.Details: \Interrupt current objective\and return to idling

Objective.Name: Morph to Scout Mode
Objective.Details: High mobility Minor Guardian\Lightly armored and cannot attack\Spawns a Spider Probe every 30 s\ \No upkeep costs

Objective.Name: Teleport
Objective.Details: \Teleport to a specified location\ Must be near a Teleporter

Objective.Name: Teleport
Objective.Details: \Teleport to a specified location\ Must be near a Teleporter\ Must not have a TSS

CORE ELDER: Non-achronal minor Guardian Resource collector and basic enclave-defense shell
Produces Power and Q-Plasma: 400 QP,P every 180s; up to 1200 QP
Can spawn Spider Probe suicide scouts

ObjectClass.Description:
SCOUT GUARDIAN:
Achronal bio-cybernetic command shell You are in here; Make sure to stay alive
Spawns a Spider Probe for recon every 30 s

ObjectClass.Name: Scout Elder - Achron
ObjectClass.Description:
SCOUT ELDER:
Achronal bio-cybernetic command shell Local container for Achron AI (i.e. you)
Engages Temporal Shield when endangered (50 s duration)
Can spawn Primordials and Amplifier Relays

Objective.Details: \Move to specified location \Move Speed: 3, MaxInc: 30\Vision Range: 8

Objective.Details: \Set this unit's commander\ \Alt-Right-Click on unit to\select its current commander

Objective.Details: \Remove unit from hierarchy\to disconnect from commander\and all subordinates

Objective.Name: Spawn Reaph
Objective.Details: \Defensive support building\Repairs friendly units and structures\in its vision radius

Objective.Name: Spawn Arcticus
Objective.Details: \Vulnerable heirarchy networking hub\Organizes and controls subordinates\Also provides a wide vision radius\Can move itself

Objective.Details: \Clear negative status effects:\ Freeze and Nanites

Objective.Details: \Interrupt current objective\and return to idling

ObjectClass.Name: Spider Probe
ObjectClass.Description:
Spider Probe: Disposable recon probe Use for espionage, scouting, or sabotage
Self destructs after 40s Upgrade Specials Tech for suicide attack
